mapper.select: SELECT s.service_id, s.account_id, a.real_name, a.idcard_no, s.unix_host, s.os_username, s.status, s.create_date, s.cost_id, c.name cost_name, c.descr cost_descr FROM service s LEFT JOIN account a ON(s.account_id=a.account_id) LEFT JOIN cost c ON(s.cost_id=c.cost_id) WHERE s.service_id=#{id}
